smoothies.name: Peach Blueberry Smoothie
smoothies.description: This sweet blend will have you feeling like it’s summertime in the dead of winter with blueberries and peaches. Plus, you’ll get your daily dose of greens with nutrient-rich kale.
smoothies.recipe: To make a delicious and healthy smoothie, start by measuring out 1 cup of chilled almond or vanilla soy milk and add it to the blender. Next, add 4 slices of fresh or frozen peaches (about 1/2 cup) and 1/4 cup of blueberries to the blender. To make it even healthier, add a handful of kale, which is packed with nutrients. To give it a flavorful kick, add 1/4 tsp. of ground cinnamon to the blender. Blend all the ingredients to the desired smoothness, making sure everything is well mixed. Finally, pour your smoothie into a glass and enjoy! This smoothie is a perfect way to start your day, as it provides you with a variety of nutrients and vitamins that will keep you energized and satisfied throughout the day.

smoothies.name: Lean, Mean, Green Machine
smoothies.description: If you’re looking for a post-workout recovery drink, this smoothie is it. Protein powder helps replenish the energy you burned, sweet banana and kiwi provide potassium and vitamin C, while coconut water helps you rehydrate.
smoothies.recipe: To make a healthy and tasty smoothie, start by gathering the ingredients: 1 medium banana, 1 kiwi, 1 cup unsweetened almond milk, 1 cup spinach, 1 scoop vanilla whey protein powder, and 1/2 cup coconut water. Peel the kiwi and cut it into pieces, then cut the medium banana into pieces as well. Add the banana and kiwi pieces to the blender, followed by 1 cup unsweetened almond milk, 1 cup spinach, 1 scoop vanilla whey protein powder, and 1/2 cup coconut water. Put the lid on the blender and pulse until the ingredients are creamy and smooth. If the smoothie is too thick, add more coconut water or unsweetened almond milk and pulse again until the desired consistency is reached. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy the refreshing taste and nutritional benefits of this delicious smoothie. This smoothie is packed with protein, fiber, and vitamins that will keep you energized and satisfied throughout the day.

smoothies.name: Cranberry Banana Smoothie
smoothies.description: The autumn berry is the star of this satisfying, fiber-rich treat. Banana adds body and sweetness, almond milk keeps the calorie count low, and maple syrup offers a seasonal sweetness.
smoothies.recipe: To make a delicious and refreshing cranberry smoothie, start by gathering the ingredients: 1 cup frozen cranberries, 1 cup unsweetened almond milk, 1 banana, 1 Tbsp. maple syrup, and 1/2 cup ice cubes. Peel the banana and cut it into chunks, then add the frozen cranberries to the blender, followed by the unsweetened almond milk, banana chunks, 1 Tbsp. maple syrup, and 1/2 cup of ice cubes. Blend the ingredients until you reach the desired thickness. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy the tangy yet sweet taste of this healthy smoothie. The cranberries are rich in antioxidants and vitamins, while the banana provides a good source of potassium and fiber. The unsweetened almond milk adds creaminess without any added sugar, and the maple syrup gives a hint of sweetness that balances the tanginess of the cranberries. This smoothie is perfect as a breakfast or snack and is an excellent way to start your day with a nutritious boost.

smoothies.name: Mocha Protein Shake
smoothies.description: This buzzy breakfast tastes like a milkshake. The secret ingredient? Walnuts. These nuts are high in protein and omega-3 fatty acids—healthy fats known to help fight inflammation and protect your heart. A dose of black coffee makes this the perfect morning shake.
smoothies.recipe: To make a rich and indulgent coffee smoothie, start by gathering the ingredients: 1 1/2 cup black coffee (made in advance and cooled), 1 large frozen banana (cut into chunks), 1 cup ice cubes, 1/4 cup walnuts, 1 heaping Tbsp. unsweetened cocoa powder, and 6 Tbsp. chocolate protein powder. Add the cooled black coffee to the blender, followed by the frozen banana chunks, 1 cup of ice cubes, 1/4 cup of walnuts, 1 heaping Tbsp. of unsweetened cocoa powder, and 6 Tbsp. of chocolate protein powder. Put the lid on the blender and blend until the ingredients are smooth. If the smoothie is too thick, add more black coffee or water and blend again until the desired consistency is reached. Pour the smoothie into two glasses and enjoy the rich and creamy taste of this delicious smoothie. The combination of coffee, cocoa powder, and chocolate protein powder creates a bold and intense flavor, while the frozen banana and walnuts add a natural sweetness and crunch. This smoothie is perfect as a mid-day snack or a post-workout drink, as it provides a boost of energy and protein to help you power through your day.

smoothies.name: Mango Madness Smoothie
smoothies.description: Take advantage of ripe mango’s disease-fighting ability with this delicious smoothie recipe.
smoothies.recipe: To make a refreshing and tropical smoothie, start by gathering the ingredients: 1 can of juice-packed pineapple chunks, 1 cup fat-free frozen vanilla yogurt, 1 large peeled and pitted mango, 1 ripe banana, and 4 cups of ice. Drain the juice from the can of pineapple chunks and add the pineapple chunks to the blender. Add 1 cup of fat-free frozen vanilla yogurt to the blender. Cut the large peeled and pitted mango into chunks and add them to the blender. Peel the ripe banana and add it to the blender. Put the lid on the blender and blend until the ingredients are smooth. Gradually add 4 cups of ice to the blender and continue blending until the entire mixture is pureed. If the smoothie is too thick, add more ice or water and blend again until the desired consistency is reached. Pour the smoothie into two glasses and enjoy the refreshing and tropical flavors of this delicious smoothie. The combination of pineapple, mango, and banana creates a sweet and tangy taste, while the frozen yogurt adds a creamy texture. This smoothie is perfect for a hot summer day or as a light and healthy breakfast.

smoothies.name: Tutti-Frutti Smoothie
smoothies.description: A splash of orange juice infuses citrus into this healthy and refreshing snack.
smoothies.recipe: To make a delicious and healthy smoothie, start by gathering the following ingredients: 1/2 cup mixed frozen berries, 1/2 cup canned crushed pineapple in juice, 1/2 cup plain yogurt, 1/2 cup sliced ripe banana, and 1/2 cup orange juice. Add the mixed frozen berries, crushed pineapple, plain yogurt, sliced banana, and orange juice to a blender. Put the lid on the blender and blend for about two minutes, or until the ingredients are smooth. If the smoothie is too thick, add more orange juice or water and blend again until the desired consistency is reached. Once the smoothie is smooth and the desired consistency has been achieved, pour it into a glass and enjoy immediately. This smoothie is perfect for breakfast, a snack, or any time of the day, and with the combination of frozen berries, pineapple, yogurt, banana, and orange juice, it is sure to be both flavorful and nutritious.

smoothies.name: Citrus-Pineapple Smoothie Bowl
smoothies.description: This smoothie bowl is a fun way to switch up your routine. It features vitamin C–rich citrus fruit, heart-healthy cashews, and gut-healthy Greek yogurt.
smoothies.recipe: To prepare this delicious and healthy breakfast bowl, you will need the following ingredients: 1/2 cup fat-free Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup frozen pineapple chunks, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 1/2 navel orange (segmented), 1/2 ruby grapefruit (segmented), chia seeds, unsweetened coconut flakes, and chopped cashews.To make the bowl, start by adding 1/2 cup of fat-free Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup of frozen pineapple chunks, 1 tsp of vanilla extract, 1/2 segmented navel orange, and 1/2 segmented ruby grapefruit to a blender. Blend the mixture until it is smooth.Next, divide the mixture between two bowls. Top each bowl with more orange and grapefruit segments, chia seeds, unsweetened coconut flakes, and chopped cashews.your healthy and delicious breakfast bowl is now ready to serve. Enjoy the fresh and fruity flavors and the variety of textures that come from the chia seeds, coconut flakes, and chopped cashews. This breakfast bowl is perfect for starting your day off right with a nutritious and satisfying meal.

smoothies.name: Peaches and Cream Oatmeal Smoothie
smoothies.description: No time for a leisurely meal? Try this grab-and-go, probiotic-rich take on morning oatmeal. Whole-grain oats contain prebiotic fiber that promotes gut health.
smoothies.recipe: To make a refreshing and nutritious smoothie, gather the following ingredients: 1/2 cup whole milk, 1/2 cup Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup rolled oats, 1 cup frozen peaches, 1/2 frozen banana, and 1/2 cup ice. Add 1/2 cup of whole milk, 1/2 cup of rolled oats, 1 cup of frozen peaches, 1/2 frozen banana, and 1/2 cup of ice to a blender. Blend the mixture to the desired thickness. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy the sweet and creamy flavors of the peaches and banana, balanced with the wholesome oats and creamy Greek yogurt. This smoothie is perfect for breakfast or as a snack, and it provides a good source of protein, fiber, and vitamins.

smoothies.name: Tropical Papaya Perfection Smoothie
smoothies.description: This coconut-infused breakfast smoothie tastes just as decadent as a milkshake. One sip will immediately transport you to a tropical island.
smoothies.recipe: This papaya smoothie recipe is a perfect way to start your day. Gather the following ingredients: 1 papaya, 1 cup of fat-free, plain yogurt, 1/2 cup fresh pineapple chunks, 1/2 cup crushed ice, 1 tsp. coconut extract, and 1 tsp. ground flaxseed. Cut the papaya in half, remove the seeds, and cut the flesh into chunks. Add the papaya chunks, 1 cup of fat-free, plain yogurt, 1/2 cup fresh pineapple chunks, 1/2 cup crushed ice, 1 tsp. coconut extract, and 1 tsp. ground flaxseed to a blender. Process the mixture for about 30 seconds or until it's smooth and frosty. Taste the smoothie and adjust the sweetness or thickness to your liking by adding more ice or coconut extract if needed. Pour the smoothie into a glass, garnish it with a slice of fresh pineapple or a sprinkle of ground flaxseed, and serve. The tropical flavors of papaya and pineapple are complemented by the creaminess of yogurt and the nuttiness of flaxseed. This smoothie is not only delicious but also a great source of vitamins, fiber, and antioxidants.

smoothies.name: Pineapple Passion Smoothie
smoothies.description: This decadently thick smoothie recipe will satisfy your cravings for an ice cream cone. Plus, pineapple contains bromelain, an enzyme that helps break down protein and may help reduce bloating.
smoothies.recipe: To make a delicious pineapple yogurt smoothie, start by gathering the ingredients: 1 cup of low-fat or light vanilla yogurt, six ice cubes, and 1 cup of pineapple chunks. Next, place the yogurt, ice cubes, and pineapple chunks into a blender. Pulse the mixture until it is smooth, making sure to stop the blender and stir the ingredients if necessary to ensure even blending. Once the smoothie is smooth and frosty, pour it into a glass and enjoy it cold.
